location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Material: printed on paper.Dimensions: 720 x 560mm, on sheet 850 x 620mm.

mods.abstract: Map of the Persian Gulf region, to accompany Bagdad Railway No. 1 (1911). Presented to both Houses of Parliament by Command of His Majesty, May 1911(London, His Majesty's Stationery Office). The publication appears on folios 215-252.The map was produced by the Topographical Section of the General Staff, War Office.
